email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider coming down to the mid-40s, say $48.50 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the laycan for this shipment? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but $48.50 is a bit tight for us. How about we meet in the middle at $49.75 per metric ton? As for the laycan, we can offer October 15-20 for loading. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $49.75 sounds reasonable. We can proceed with that rate. The laycan of October 15-20 works for us as well. Could you confirm the demurrage terms? Also, please send over the charter party agreement for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that we’re aligned on the rate and laycan. The demurrage rate is set at $20,000 per day, pro-rata. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly for your review. Let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. The demurrage terms are acceptable. I’ve reviewed the charter party agreement, and everything looks good on our end. Let’s proceed with the booking. Looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent! I’ll confirm the booking and send you the finalized details shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and I look forward to a smooth shipment. Best regards, Sarah
